tasks.label: Start dev server
tasks.command: if [ -f "$(which pnpm)" ]; then pnpm run dev; else npm run dev; fi

tasks.label: Build project
tasks.command: if [ -f "$(which pnpm)" ]; then pnpm run build; else npm run build; fi && cd docs/.vitepress/dist && mkdir Wiki && mv * Wiki && python -m http.server

tasks.label: Generate tree
tasks.command: if [ -f "$(which pnpm)" ]; then pnpm run gen; else npm run gen; fi
